snippet: The strong increase in inventory building in May could be evidence that businesses were more confident about the future.
abstract: Commerce Dept reports wholesale stockpiles rose 0.8 percent in May 2015, double amount of gain in April.
lead_paragraph: The strong increase in inventory building in May could be evidence that businesses were more confident about the future.

headline.main: Wholesale Stockpiles Rose 0.8. Percent in May
headline.print_headline: Wholesale Stockpiles Rose 0.8. Percent in May
